```{r data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tbl_l = fetch(con = con,
              schema = schema,
              tbl = tbl,
              col = col,
              entry = entry,
              verbose = verbose)
meta_dt = meta(con = con,
               schema = schema,
               tbl = tbl,
               output_dir = output_dir,
               output_file = output_file)
```

```{r text, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
if (!is.null(text)) {
  if (file.exists(text)) {
    readLines(text)
  } else {
    cat(text)
  }
}
```

```{r meta, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
knitr::kable(meta_dt)
```

## Table
```{r table, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
summary_dt = tbl_l$summary
idx = grep('^distinct$|n_', names(summary_dt), value = TRUE)
n_row = meta_dt[ variable == 'table rows', as.numeric(value) ]
summary_dt[ ,
            (idx) := lapply(.SD, function(x) perc_value(x, n_row)),
            .SDcols = idx ]

knitr::kable(summary_dt)
```

## Column plots
```{r plot, echo=FALSE, fig.height=7, fig.width=15, dpi=72, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
if (plot_distinct) {
  for (i in seq_along(tbl_l$distinct)) {
    dat = tbl_l$distinct[[i]]
    col = names(tbl_l$distinct)[i]
    setDT(dat)
    dat[ , var20 := substr(get(col), 1, 20) ]
    dat[ , n_distinct := as.integer(n_distinct) ] # NOTE to get rid of integer64, that might be returned - can be done more gracefully
    if (!is.null(plot_limit))
      dat = dat[1:plot_limit, ]
    # header
    cat('  \n###', col, '\n') # OPTION pander::pandoc.header(paste0('Column: ', col), level = 3)
    # plots
    if (plot_type == 'gg')
      print(pl_gg(dat = dat, col = col, x = 'var20', y = 'n_distinct'))
    if (plot_type == 'bp')
      pl_bp(dat = dat, col = col, x = dat$var20, y = dat$n_distinct)
    if (plot_type == 'tree')
      pl_tree(dat = dat, index = 'n_distinct', vsize = 'n_distinct')
    cat('<a href="#top">Back to top</a>')
    cat('  \n') # OPTION # pander::pandoc.p(''); pander::pandoc.p('')
  }
} else {
  print('Plots should not be printed.')
}
```

```{r write, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

} else {

}
```
